title: The Andre Truth Interview: Being from Kitchen Crips, 9 Murder Charges, Drill Music & More
description:
Dre shares his fascinating story, his immense growth, wisdom, traveling, doing bigger and better things, helping kids and how he left the streets behind. Amazing interview! S/O Justin Hunte! Be on the lookout for their podcast! https://www.instagram.com/andretruth07/
https://www.instagram.com/thecompanyman/
